articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Honda debuts new global EV series, Honda Zero, coming in 2026 - The Verge
articles.description: Honda introduced Honda Zero, a new global EV series that will debut in North America starting in 2026. The first vehicle will be based on the sloping, low-riding Saloon concept.
articles.content:
Honda debuts new global EV series, Honda Zero, coming in 2026
